description:
It seems Lord En isn`t one to admit defeat quite so easily, as he challenges Furuichi and the rest to endless rematches. But it`s not long until Furuichi and Lamia discover the whereabouts of Lord En, and it`s only a matter of time until a fight breaks out! Will Oga`s training be enough? And can Aoi get back in time?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sorry to Have Kept You Waiting
